channel.title: Short guide on how to set up environmental variables?
channel.description: May anyone post a short little guide on how to set up my environmental variables? I'm using JDK 6u16 atm, and i need the codes, and where to put them. Greatly appreciated!

item.title: Short guide on how to set up environmental variables?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You msut not have JDK 1.6 Update 16 then.

Go to:

C:/Program Files/Java/

What folders are inside there?

Nothing else is needed to compile a server, just replace your current compiler.bat with that code i posted.

Also, please don’t call me Josh

item.source: Short guide on how to set up environmental variables?

item.title: Short guide on how to set up environmental variables?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I posted on your last thread…

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

Read full topic
